form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS, Form Number: NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 PLACE Rawalpindi MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo, Day YC.) May 15, 1996 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at ISLAMABAD PAKISTAN NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo, Day, Yr.) F M I certify that on the above date I examined KHAN ABDUL GHAFOOR 1907 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON B-781543 REGIONAL PASSPORT March 21, 1996 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION OFFICE, GUJRAT. I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) "B3" CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chanoroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease HARD OF HEARING BOTH EARS Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacke of Insanity Narootio Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Aloonollsm EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Reaction mm Describe findings: Calcific granulomas in right apex and left parahilar area. No active pulmonary Not Done pathology seen. Cardiac Shadow is with in normal DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) limits. DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DATE READ DR AHMED RAZA JAN May 15, 1996 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory teet performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: VDRL TEST TYPE: (By Genelavia Mixt, Sanofi Pasteurs) ELISA DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY DR AHMED RAZA JAN May 15,1996 Armed Forces Institute May 16,1996 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) of Pathology, Rawaipindi DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS CLASS - "B3" - PULMONARY TUBERCULOSIS, OLD HEALED. Calcific granulomas in left apex & left parahilar area. CLASS - "B" - Hard of hearing both ears. - Bilateral immature cataract. - Eye sight corrected with glasses. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refere to me. 15.5.96 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE DR AHMED RAZA JAN the Road May 16, 1996 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM REVISED s- DEPT.
